About

My origins & where I am now

Nothing excites me more than the act of creation, especially on the worldwide web.

I discovered my passion for programming at the young age of 14 years old.

Since high school, I've loved to code until late hours of the night. I started my own agency and worked on 60+ consulting projects for international clients.

With over 10 years experience in leading my agency, I have built performant apps used by millions of users.

Lab

My personal open-source passion projects

Air Quality Impact & Visualizations

Real-time air quality impact calculator that transforms complex AQI metrics into immediately understandable health consequences. Combines location-based AQI monitoring with medical research data to visualize permanent health damage, debunk pollution immunity myths, and drive awareness through shareable health insights
Visit Project â†’Source on Github

Kevin: Open Source AI Software Engineer

Open-source AI coding assistant interface inspired by Devin, focused on automating boilerplate code generation. Increases developer productivity by handling repetitive tasks.
Visit Project â†’Source on Github

Webstiles In-Browser UI Prototyping

Browser-based UI prototyping tool that streamlined client communication and design approval process. Reduced revision cycles and improved client satisfaction.
Visit Project â†’Source on Github

Less Confusing C++

Free C++ programming book that simplified complex concepts for high school students. Reorganized traditional coursework to improve learning outcomes.
Visit Project â†’

IndiaSmile COVID-19 Tracker & Stats

COVID-19 statistics platform serving 600k daily users and built a 2500+ member community during the pandemic. Provided critical health information and emotional support.
Visit Project â†’

KeyZen Touch Typing Game

Award-winning touch typing game with animated keyboard visualization and pastel aesthetics. Helps users improve typing speed through engaging practice.
Visit Project â†’Source on Github

Bulls & Cows Solver Research

Award-winning research paper and interactive demo analyzing optimal algorithms for Bulls & Cows game. Combined theoretical analysis with practical implementation.
Visit Project â†’

Physics Simulators Collection

Collection of interactive physics simulators helping students visualize complex concepts. Improved understanding of phenomena like Simple Harmonic Motion and P-N junctions.
